lead_paragraph: Shortstop J.J. Hardy was placed on the 15-day disabled list Tuesday by the Baltimore Orioles because of a hairline fracture in his left foot.

headline.print_headline: Orioles Place SS JJ Hardy on DL With Foot Fracture
headline.main: Orioles Place SS JJ Hardy on DL With Foot Fracture

snippet: Shortstop J.J. Hardy was placed on the 15-day disabled list Tuesday by the Baltimore Orioles because of a hairline fracture in his left foot....
